mapper.insert: insert into SYS_LOG (ID, OPERATE_MODULE, OPERATE_CONTENT, OPERATE_TYPE, OPERATE_BY, OPERATE_TIME, OPERATE_IP, OPERATE_REMARK) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{operateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update SYS_LOG
OPERATE_MODULE = #{operateModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATE_CONTENT = #{operateContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATE_TYPE = #{operateType,jdbcType=CHAR},
OPERATE_BY = #{operateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATE_TIME = #{operateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATE_IP = #{operateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATE_REMARK = #{operateRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SYS_LOG set OPERATE_MODULE = #{operateModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATE_CONTENT = #{operateContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATE_TYPE = #{operateType,jdbcType=CHAR}, OPERATE_BY = #{operateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATE_TIME = #{operateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATE_IP = #{operateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATE_REMARK = #{operateRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: 1=1 and to_date(t2.operate_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')>=to_date('${startTime} 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(t2.operate_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')<=to_date('${endTime} 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
